shorts.title_distilled: Culvert replacement to close part of Route 347 in Lackawanna County.
shorts.description: A 1.5-mile stretch of state Route 347 in Scott Township will close for culvert replacement beginning September 2
shorts.content: A 1.5-mile stretch of state Route 347 in Scott Township will close for culvert replacement beginning September 2

shorts.title: Easing first day of school nerves with chalk
shorts.title_distilled: Easing first day of school nerves with chalk.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Children and their families are gearing up for the start of school in a colorful way that helps students shake off first-day jitters. Kids grabbed chalk provided by the Dunmore PTA and filled the sidewalks with bright colors, friendly messages, and playful drawings. Parents joined in, helping set the tone [...]

shorts.title: Residents enjoy summer's end at PA state park
shorts.title_distilled: Residents enjoy summer's end at PA state park.
shorts.description: WYOMING, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — As the summer comes to a close, many campgrounds and state parks will see a dip in activity, but not before the holiday weekend. Northeastern Pennsylvania's state parks have a steady amount of foot traffic these days. A lot of people were in a Luzerne County park to soak up [...]
